page.title: 02INTRODUCTION CONTD
page.content: The area is central to large towns and cities: Barnsley, Rotherham, Doncaster and Sheffield. It is also close to the {National Park}:the Peak District and also the Pennines. An interview of people in Hoyland town centre revealed that older people liked the shopping centre and market and the fact that it is near the M1 motorway so they can easily get to other places. People complained about the bad roads and pavements and that there were no good bus shelters. Young people like the sports centre and Youth Clubs while the older people liked the Bingo, pubs and churches. The motorway ,the M1 runs to the west of Hoyland making communication to the rest of the country easy.
